name: Cloud Connectors 0.8.0
body:
[[#539](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/539)] Support DefaultAWSCredentialsProviderChain
[[FISH-6455](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/575)] Cloud Connectors examples profile
[[maven-ejb-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/536)] Bump maven-ejb-plugin from 3.1.0 to 3.2.1
[[maven-javadoc-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/571)] Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1
[[aws-java-sdk-bom](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/573)] Bump aws-java-sdk-bom from 1.12.220 to 1.12.286
[[aws-java-sdk-sqs](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/574)] Bump aws-java-sdk-sqs from 1.12.220 to 1.12.286
[[kafka-clients](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/565)] Bump kafka-clients from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1

name: Cloud Connectors 0.7.0
body:
[[#357](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/357)] Changed Kafka REST JNDI name to be global. Added to top-level modules
[[#240](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/240)] Initial GitHub Action for testing with different JDK versions 
[[testng ](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/291)] Bump testng from 7.3.0 to 7.4.0
[[maven-gpg-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/328)] Bump maven-gpg-plugin from 1.6 to 3.0.1
[[kafka-clients](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/392)] Bump kafka-clients from 2.8.0 to 3.0.0 
[[maven-javadoc-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/333)] Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0
[[aws-java-sdk-bom](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/334)] Bump aws-java-sdk-bom from 1.11.923 to 1.11.1024
[[aws-java-sdk-sqs](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/429)] Bump aws-java-sdk-sqs from 1.11.1024 to 1.12.129

name: Cloud Connectors 0.6.0
body:
[[CC-18](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/78)] Fix interface name in Kafka Examples
[[COMMUNITY-CONTRIBUTION](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/97)]Add support for complex additional properties in Kafka connector
[[kafka-clients](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/168)] Bump kafka-clients from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0
[[org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/201)] Bump org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3 from 1.2.4 to 1.2.5 
[[aws-java-sdk-bom](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/203)] Bump aws-java-sdk-bom from 1.11.816 to 1.11.822
[[aws-java-sdk-sqs](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/202)] Bump aws-java-sdk-sqs from 1.11.820 to 1.11.822
[[maven-war-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/200)] Bump maven-war-plugin from 3.3.0 to 3.3.1
[[maven-ejb-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/190)] Bump maven-ejb-plugin from 3.0.1 to 3.1.0 
[[maven-javadoc-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/156)] Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.2.0 
[[maven-source-plugin](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/125)] Bump maven-source-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1
[[testng ](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/89)] Bump testng from 6.14.3 to 7.0.0

name: Cloud Connectors 0.5.0
body:
[[CC-15](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/74)] MQTT added manualReconnectOnPublish
[[CC-16](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/73)] Refactor of the Inbound side of the Kafka JCA Adapter to enable both Asynch and Synch processing

name: Cloud Connectors 0.4.0
body:
[[CC-4](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/69)] Upgrade AWS SDK
[[CC-10](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/68)] pom cleanup and dependency bump
[[FROM_COMMUNIITY](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/61)] Declare no transaction support for Kafka
[[FROM_COMMUNIITY](https://github.com/payara/Cloud-Connectors/pull/59)] Cache annotated methods and update Kafka client
